aboutChat1: Introduce yourself briefly, sharing your budget and location. Once sent, {{receiverName}}  decide whether to accept it.
aboutChat2: Upon acceptance, you'll receive a notification, so ensure your initial message leaves a positive impression!
sendMessageError1: Oops, a technical issue occurred while sending the message. To view the sent message, go to the Messages tab.
sendMessageError2: Oops! Something went wrong while sending your message. Please reach out to our support team for assistance.
successMessage: The message has been successfully sent. If {{receiverName}} accepts your message, you will receive an SMS.
acceptReject: If you accept message, {{receiverName}} will be able to message you and will see your profile. If you won‚Äôt accapt {{receiverName}} can‚Äôt send you messages.
rejected: You can't send messages, and you won't receive theirs either. It appears that your message was rejected.
rejectedMessages: Since you've declined the message, you're currently unable to send messages. To proceed with communication, please click the 'accept' button.
